-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Run random effect using cprng-aes, a crypto pseudo number generator.
--   
--   Any help (especially documentation) is welcome
@package cprng-aes-effect
@version 0.1.0.2

module Crypto.Random.Effect.AES

-- | Run the effect using an AES counter mode pseudo random number
--   generator.
runAESRNG :: SetMember Lift (Lift IO) r => Eff (State AESRNG :> (Reader EntropyPool :> r)) a -> Eff r a
instance Typeable AESRNG
